mapper.insert: insert into attendances (attendanceid, memberid, attendancearrivetime, ATTENDANCEDATE, ATTENDANCESTATUS ) values (seq_attendanceid.nextval, #{memberId}, #{attendanceArriveTime}, #{attendanceDate}, #{attendanceStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERNAME AS "memberName", ATTENDANCEDATE AS "attendanceDate", ATTENDANCEARRIVETIME AS "attendanceArriveTime", ATTENDANCEDEPARTTIME AS "attendanceDepartTime", ATTENDANCESTATUS AS "attendanceStatus" FROM MEMBERS, ATTENDANCES WHERE MEMBERS.MEMBERID = ATTENDANCES.MEMBERID ORDER BY ATTENDANCEDATE DESC OFFSET (#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowsPerPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ATTENDANCEID AS "attendanceId", MEMBERNAME AS "memberName", ATTENDANCEDATE AS "attendanceDate", ATTENDANCEARRIVETIME AS "attendanceArriveTime", ATTENDANCEDEPARTTIME AS "attendanceDepartTime", ATTENDANCESTATUS AS "attendanceStatus" FROM MEMBERS, ATTENDANCES WHERE MEMBERS.MEMBERID = ATTENDANCES.MEMBERID AND ATTENDANCES.MEMBERID = #{memberId} ORDER BY ATTENDANCEDATE
